data.name: Ares
data.description: The Olympian god of war, Ares revels in violence, bloodshed, and conquest. His thirst for battle allows him to protect his allies by turning his enemy's strengths against them and overwhelming them with sheer brutality.

starItems.name: Ares
starItems.description: The Olympian god of war, Ares revels in violence, bloodshed, and conquest. His thirst for battle allows him to protect his allies by turning his enemy's strengths against them and overwhelming them with sheer brutality.

2.nextUpgrade: Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage. Counterattack breaks this Chain

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage.
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects from primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects.
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects.
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
7.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>

item.name: Ares' Basic Awakened Ability Material
item.description: Used to further upgrade character abilities.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.

8.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects.
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

Gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
Counterattack breaks this Chain.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
2.nextUpgrade: Clear all Barrier on primary target

3.description:
Clear all Barrier on primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

4.description:
Clear all Barrier on primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

5.description:
Clear all Barrier on primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

6.description:
Clear all Barrier on primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to primary target

7.description:
Clear all Barrier on primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
7.nextUpgrade:
Clear all Barrier on all enemies
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to primary target

item.name: Ares' Special Awakened Ability Material
item.description: Used to further upgrade character abilities.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.

8.description:
Clear all Barrier on all enemies.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to primary target.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>5%</color> Drain.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>5%</color> Drain + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary attack
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to secondary attack

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to primary and adjacent enemies

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary attack
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to secondary attack

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary attack
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to secondary attack
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effects into positive effects on self

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.

Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect into a positive effect for self.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
7.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects

item.name: Ares' Ultimate Awakened Ability Material
item.description: Used to further upgrade character abilities.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.

8.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects into positive effects on self.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

1.description:
On Spawn:
 > In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, after all other characters' On Spawn effects, copy and clear all positive effects from all enemies to this character (Positive effects from a room's War Bonus apply after this Passive). This clear cannot be resisted.

On Turn, if this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Speed Bar and lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

While <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Non-<color=#fff568>MYTHIC</color> enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color> or <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
1.nextUpgrade: On Spawn, In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, after all other characters' On Spawn effects, copy and clear all <color=#fff568>Charged</color> from all enemies to this character

2.description:
On Spawn:
 > In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, after all other characters' On Spawn effects, copy and clear all positive effects and <color=#fff568>Charged</color> from all enemies to this character (Positive effects from a room's War Bonus apply after this Passive). This clear cannot be resisted.

On Turn, if this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Speed Bar and lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

While <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Non-<color=#fff568>MYTHIC</color> enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color> or <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
2.nextUpgrade: On Spawn, In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, after all other characters' On Spawn effects, copy and clear all <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from all enemies to this character

3.description:
On Spawn:
 > In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, after all other characters' On Spawn effects, copy and clear all positive effects, <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, and <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color>, from all enemies to this character (Positive effects from a room's War Bonus apply after this Passive). This clear cannot be resisted.

On Turn, if this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Speed Bar and lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

While <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Non-<color=#fff568>MYTHIC</color> enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color> or <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.

4.description:
On Spawn:
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>.
 > In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, after all other characters' On Spawn effects, copy and clear all positive effects, <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, and <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color>, from all enemies to this character (Positive effects from a room's War Bonus apply after this Passive). This clear cannot be resisted.

On Turn, if this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Speed Bar and lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

While <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Non-<color=#fff568>MYTHIC</color> enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color> or <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.

5.description:
On Spawn:
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>.
 > In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, after all other characters' On Spawn effects, copy and clear all positive effects, <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, and <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color>, from all enemies to this character (Positive effects from a room's War Bonus apply after this Passive). This clear cannot be resisted.

On Turn, if this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Speed Bar and lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

While <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Non-<color=#fff568>MYTHIC</color> enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color> or <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
 > This character cannot gain <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
At the start of any match, enemy characters cannot spawn with <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>
Gain <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

item.name: Ares' Passive Awakened Ability Material
item.description: Used to further upgrade character abilities.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.

6.description:
At the start of any match, enemy characters cannot spawn with <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>.

On Spawn:
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
 > In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, after all other characters' On Spawn effects, copy and clear all positive effects, <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, and <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color>, from all enemies to this character (Positive effects from a room's War Bonus apply after this Passive). This clear cannot be resisted.

On Turn, if this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Speed Bar and lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

While <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Non-<color=#fff568>MYTHIC</color> enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color> or <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
 > This character cannot gain <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
